messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Sandra's writings in redneck
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 9/25/03 6:34:54 PM, tktraas@paulbunyan.net writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 9/25/03 6:34:54 PM, tktraas@... writes:

<< Man I love this!

LOL!!!

Kelli~
>>

What happened was I sent the original to another group and someone commented
back to this group instead (it seems), so the first reference (without the
attached art, which is a pain) is this:

A friend send this. I can't just quote the words, it comes as art, but what
she did was go to SandraDodd.com
and "translate" the page with the site below. It has just a little
redeeming social and educational value,
but it's aerobic humor if you just like the feeling of being surprised and
amused.

If you can't read this e-mail don't worry, it's just humor and of no import
otherwise.

I like "lives bein' changed an' they're still bein' changed, cuss it all
t'tarnation."


Here's the link for "the dialiectizer": http://www.rinkworks.com/dialect/


Sandra

messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Sandra's writings in redneck
messages.msgSnippet: Man I love this! LOL!!! Kelli~ ... From: Deborah Lewis To: UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com Sent: Thursday, September 25, 2003 12:49 PM Subject:
messages.messageBody:
Man I love this!

LOL!!!

Kelli~


----- Original Message -----
From: Deborah Lewis
To: UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Thursday, September 25, 2003 12:49 PM
Subject: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Sandra's writings in redneck


I really like "unskooin'."
Deb L, hell on spell check
_______________________________________________________________________
"It's like "jest say no." Jest say no t'skoo years an' skoo schedules an'
skoo speckashuns, skoo habits an' fears an' terminology. Jest say no
t'separeetin' th' wo'ld into impo'tant an' unimpo'tant thin's, into
separeetin' smarts into math, science, histo'y an' language arts, wif
moosic, art an' "PE" set in their less impo'tant li'l places. Most of
unskooin' has t'happen inside th' parents. They need t'spend some time
so'tin' out whut is real fum whut is cornstruck, an' whut occurs in
nature fum whut only occurs in skoo. It's whut happens af'er all thet
skoo stuff is banished fum yer life."

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Sandra's writings in redneck
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 9/25/03 11:54:21 AM, ddzimlew@juno.com writes:  Shouldn t that a been unimpoRtant thAHngs ? My redneck dialect
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 9/25/03 11:54:21 AM, ddzimlew@... writes:

<< unimpo'tant thin's, >>

Shouldn't that a' been "unimpoRtant thAHngs"?

My redneck dialect is West Texas. They lost no internal "r"s. End "r," who
cares?
They'll sleep on a pilla and look at theirselfs in a mirra, but when there's
an r in the middle of a word, EVERYBODY knows it.

Sandra
